item.title: Authenticating Spring Boot apps on AKS with MSI
item.description: Last week I was looking for the best solution to connect to Azure services for a few pods within Azure Kubernetes Service. These services are build with Spring Boot and my first idea was to only connect to Azure KeyVault. Along the way I discovered the awesomeness of Managed Service Identities and extended it to another Azure Service, Azure Storage. item.title: Azure From the Commandline
item.description: One of the subjects I wanted to touch on this blog is my journey in my new job. And with my new job a new cloud adventure started. In my previous job I was primarily focussed on IBM Cloud, AWS and a bit of Google Cloud. Although all clouds are in some way the same, there are also a lot of difficulties, hick-ups and new ideas marching around the corner.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: While I’ve been thinking a lot about writing my thoughts down a lot over the years, it never really happened. And although it is now happening, I’m still looking which direction to take. My first blog posts will probably focus on my journey, discoveries, tips and tricks from my job experiences and a lot of other stuff you’re probably not interested in. However, if you are and want me to know that, don’t hesitate.
